title: Small Group Activity - Build a To Do List for the Double Calculator using TDD

quizDescription.text:
Purpose of the Activity
The purpose of this activity is to continue learning how to use Test-Driven Development and to start the implementation of the calculator supporting double values and the other required features.

attachment: 05 Small Group Activity - Build a To Do List for the Double Calculator using TDD.zip

questions.questionText: Summarize the Small Group Activity - Build a To Do List for the Double Calculator using TDD
